abstract.para: This topic focuses on updating your system using &cockpit;.

topic.para: To update your system, proceed as follows:

step.para: Navigate to the Software Updates page.
Click Check for Updates to get a list of new package updates and patches available for your system. We recommend installing the patches marked as important as soon as possible.
Now you can update your system either with immediate reboot, or the reboot might be postponed:
Click Update and Reboot to apply patches and updates. After the update is complete, your system will be restarted and will boot into the new snapshot.

To postpone reboot after the update, select Update without Reboot from the three-dot menu. Bear in mind that you need to reboot the system to activate the snapshot with updates. If you perform further changes without rebooting the system beforehand, a new snapshot will be created from the same point as the snapshots with updates. Therefore, the new snapshot will not include the updates.
